main event: On the evening of September 21, 1964, an observer in Middletown, Ohio, noticed a bright light in the sky that moved slowly and then shot straight up at high speed.
interesting points: The light appeared to be about 1 mile high and 1/2 mile away,Size of the light was comparable to a basketball,The light was glowing with a bluish-white hue,The observation lasted for about 10 minutes,The observer noted that the weather was clear and there was no sound during the observation.
